name: Void Dust
description:
The events of this game develop inside the head of the victim in a car accident. It's dark...very dark, on the way to the exit you will stumble upon events related to real life. You must get out of prison in your own body!

The game was developed within 7 days. Models in the game were taken from third-party resources

Team: Nuk, Albedo

Our social networks Discord: kxinavra#6741
